thread.title: Baidu adds an AI personal assistant, Duer, to its mobile search app - ComputerWorld
thread.title_full: Baidu adds an AI personal assistant, Duer, to its mobile search app - ComputerWorld - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: ComputerWorld
title: Baidu adds an AI personal assistant, Duer, to its mobile search app - ComputerWorld
text:
As Microsoft's virtual assistant Cortana introduces herself to new Windows 10 users around the world, Chinese search giant Baidu is adding its own AI-based assistant, Duer, to a mobile app used by millions of Chinese. Baidu showed off Duer's ability to place orders online with a version of the software embodied in a a cute little robot.
 ComputerWorld.
